resources.string: I\'m a flutter/mobile developer with over 1 year of professional experience inmaking websites and web apps that I feel it is valuable to other people, I like mywork to be a thing that makes people life\'s easier, and I value that lot. I\'m alwayslooking for a way to learn more skills and expand my knowledge base. I\'m alwaysproud of being a team player and always work with my passion for what I build
